title: Not typing in English/Spanish/Canadian French on NA Servers bannable?
body: If your teammates are flaming you in English but refuse to type to team in English in normal conversation count as refusing to communicate? How do i play with multi-Language speaking people? and if they're flaming other in a language you don't know, how do you know they are?

replies.body:
Each region has their own set of supported languages on a technical level, but it's still a global game.  You don't need to use chat at all if you don't want, but it's totally fine if you write in another language.  Our [supported languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide may also offer more info here!

Keep in mind, though, that those who try to circumvent inappropriate language or try to cause bad experiences in this way don't tend to get away with it.
